column2: "...I love the seabed. You can go there without an exploration quest and I think it is a place that is filled with mysteries."
"...I might be wrong but I can feel that the photons on the seabed are on a level more well-honed than the others."
"...with you, I think we can share this well-honed feeling."
"...Am I looking forward to it too much? For me, I want to totally enjoy this exploration."
